message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This is an exclusive deal tailored just for you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
